title: Information Literacy Assessment Tool Development and Application Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental information retrieval and analytical skills, with experience in utilizing task-related data
context.additional_context: A program to strengthen practicing professionals' competencies in analyzing and evaluating scientific information, conducted in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand the design principles of information literacy assessment tools and develop three or more assessment items.
Learners can validate field-applicable assessment tools based on the PIMS (Perception of Information Literacy Measurement Scale) model.
Learners can analyze assessment data collected in mobile environments and propose strategies to enhance information literacy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
